thread.title: adidas SPEZIAL Pays Tribute to Jamaican Subculture for SS17
thread.title_full: adidas SPEZIAL Pays Tribute to Jamaican Subculture for SS17

author: Alec Leach
title: adidas SPEZIAL Pays Tribute to Jamaican Subculture for SS17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 8 images from this gallery. 
Brand: adidas SPEZIAL
Season: Spring/Summer 2017
Key Pieces: Tracksuits are always a vibe — Three Stripe-branded ones especially.
Editor’s Notes: SPEZIAL, adidas’s nostalgic line that pays tribute to the brand’s long subcultural history, is back with more goods. For SS17, SPEZIAL explores the deep connection between British and Jamaican subcultures, with a lookbook and video starring reggae artist Chronixx. Check out the film the brand produced below.

Speaking of adidas, the brand’s sales are skyrocketing all over the globe — especially the USA.
